name: fluture
description: A mathematically correct alternative to Promises for asynchronous control flow

scripts.post-merge: npm run check-version && npm install && npm dedupe && npm run check-security && npm outdated --long
scripts.setup: npm run post-merge && cp scripts/hooks/* .git/hooks && git config push.followTags true
scripts.test: npm run check-version && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit: node --harmony-destructuring node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --report html ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --ui bdd --reporter spec --check-leaks --full-trace && codecov

author: Aldwin Vlasblom <aldwin.vlasblom@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Avaq)
